column1: full and in at middle stump. Pushed to mid-on's right off the front foot
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
inside edge onto back leg. Length ball wide outside off. Throws his hands at it and drags it back
short of a length on leg stump, flicked to fine leg
length and in at middle stump. Nudged to mid-on's right off the inside half. Pushed with hard hands Kuldeep misfields
length at off stump, driven to  mid-off's right
length and wide outside off. Looks to punch on the up, beaten on the outside edge
length at off stump, punches with hard hands. Chips it towards mid-off
swats it over the bowler off the low part of the bat. But it's over the boundary on the bounce. Short of a length from Shami, and an angled bat heave from Munro on the up

dropped! Karthik puts down a tough, low chance to his left. Manages to get only one hand on it. The only slip fielder is wide. Length outside off, looks to pierce this through the covers and gets a thick edge that flies quick and low. He can only push it towards third man with a big dive
outside edge wide of slip. Short of a length and straightening as he defends inside the line on the back foot

straight to slip this time! Dhawan Rohit is narrower at slip this time and there's no diving required from anyone. Length outside off, looks for the angled-batted swat off the front foot. It gets slightly big on him. No demon movement of any sort. He just wasn't behind the line of this as it angled in towards the corridor. Dhawan with a crouch and reverse cup, holds on easily
length outside off, left alone
length outside off, blocked solidly into the covers
length at the stumps, defended from the crease
short of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, looks to punch through cover, under-edges into the covers
short of a length on leg stump, poked to midwicket off the back foot
length on middle stump, defended into the leg side off the front foot
short of a length just outside off, left alone
length and just outside off. Shapes away off the surface. Driven slightly away from the body, on the up to mid-off
length and just outside off, left alone
length just outside off, sliced straight to point on the up
short of a length just outside off, stays leg side of it and guides to third man
length outside off, gets on the front foot and opens the face to run this down to third man
picks up and completes the shot with a whippy follow through. Overpitched on leg stump and he gets to the pitch and launches this high over midwicket
length at off stump, defended down the pitch
short of a length at off stump, punched into the off side on the up
lifts it over mid-on. Full and into the pads. Gets the weight on the front foot and flicks uppishly, intentionally, wide of that fielder
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length and up at leg stump. Late on the flick and is rapped on the thigh guard
short of a length just outside off, hurried tap into the covers
short of a length on middle stump, whipped to midwicket off the back foot
short of a length outside off. Gets on top of the bounce by leaping off - both feet in the air as he punches this firmly through extra cover
length at off stump, looks to run it down to third man. Cramped on it. Can't get it through the ring
sent upstairs for a run-out decision at the non-striker's end. Shami parried this onto the stumps but Guptill was well in. Length just outside off, tapped back at the bowler off the back foot

thin edge and an easy catch for Karthik. A lazy waft from Guptill. This ball wobbles a touch before going on straight from the surface. He doesn't get the front leg at it as he looks to drive. Not close enough as a result and he's done
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length at middle stump, blocked down the pitch
thick edge wide of point and down to third man. Length just outside off, closes the face slightly on this as he leans in
length at off stump, punched to mid-off
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length at leg stump, pushed into the midwicket region off the front foot. Direct hit from Pandya as Taylor hops into the crease
length at middle stump, defended off the back foot
length on off stump, defended to mid-on off the back foot
length and just outside off, mistimed tap to mid-off
length and just outside off, tapped on the up into the off side
short of a length just outside off, chopped down to third man
length and just outside off, punched through cover off the back foot
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
nicely done. Full and in at off stump. Doesn't push into this too much. Allows it to skid on and meets it with the full face. Gets it between bowler and mid-off
length and just outside off, punched to extra cover off the back foot
length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length outside off, stabbed to third man's right off the back foot
length at off stump, driven with the turn to long-off
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
short and just outside off, cut straight to point
floated up at off stump, driven to long-off
oh lovely. Short of a length and turning away. Waits on it to arrive. It arrives slowly, but he's patient. Punches firmly to bisect cover and extra
length on middle, pushed to mid-on
length, drifting into the pads, tucked away to deep squareleg
length on off, defended with soft hands to point
full on middle, pushed to mid-on off the front foot
length, angled in, pushed to midwicket
full on middle, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
tossed up full and wide outside off. Leans in and drives to sweeper's left
tossed up on leg stump, flicked to long-on
length outside off, driven straight to extra cover
is that off the bat? Yes. Taylor too early on the attempted lap sweep. Jams it into the pitch off the under-edge and it trickles past leg stump
length outside off, tapped to sweeper cover off the back foot

shot! Length ball turning away outside off. Gets on the back foot and uses his wrists to punch this past midwicket after it has turned a long way. Lovely work. Any turn at the moment is slow off the surface
length outside off, blocked down the pitch
full and flatted this time. Pushed down the pitch from the crease
leading edge rolls out to extra cover. Looks a googly from Kuldeep, full on middle. He closes the face too early on the flick
length at off stump, gets on the back foot and hurriedly defends into the leg side off the inside half
full on middle stump, gets down and laps to long leg
past the edge. Not sure that was intended to go away. Regular legbreak holds its line as KW gets on the back foot to defend on an off stump line
length at middle stump, defended to midwicket off the inside half

sliced to deep square's left. Short ball up at off, pulls hurriedly and is late on it. Dhawan picks up, swivels and chucks it straight down the middle of the pitch. Rohit at extra cover can't get to it. It's an overthrow at sweeper cover
length at off stump, pushed back to the bowler on the up
short outside off. Gets on the back foot and looks to pull. Beaten. That was quite wide. Skid through from under the bat
short of a length at off stump, dabbed down to third man
length at off stump, guides it down to third man
length at middle stump, defended off the back foot
length at leg stump, defended on the front foot
length at leg stump, steps out and drives to long-on
full on middle, flicked to midwicket on the front foot
full on leg stump, flicked to long-on
short of a length on middle stump, whipped to midwicket's right off the back foot
length at off stump, punched back to the bowler on the up
length on off stump, defended down the pitch
short of a length at off stump, steps out and taps it back to the bowler
toe-end trickles to keeper's right. Short of a length at off stump, looks to pull with the angle. Loses his shape on it. It comes on slowly
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
length outside off, jabbed to third man's right
length just outside off, opens the face and runs this to short third

plucks it mid-air! Hardik Pandya is having a great comeback day. A super, super catch to his left. This is slow, dipping at a length and on middle stump. Williamson steps out and is too early on it. It dips on him and his flick is aerial as a result. At midwicket, Pandya flies to his left and gets his hands around this
full on the pads, flicked to deep squareleg to get off the mark
slower, full on off, defended with soft hands
drifting in, a bit shorter, defended back
tossed up, enticing Taylor to have a go, but doesn't take the bait and just pushes it through the covers
short, angled away, pulled to the right of deep squareleg
length outside off, left alone
length, angled away, defended to point, Latham takes a step, Taylor says no
full, angling away, defended off the front foot
full and angling away, Latham drives but gets a thick inside edge and drags it to the bowler
length outside off, Latham looks for a quick single having defended to point, Taylor shouts no
full, drifting in, defended off the front foot
full and straight, pushed to long-on
slower, tossed away, drifts away before turning back in a little, defended off the front foot
length outside off, skips down the wicket but opts to defend
full on leg stump, swept over the leg slip for a couple. Bit of a top edge, but safe
full and on the pads, there was a leg slip for that nudge to the leg side and it was aerial but just wide off the fielder
full on off, moves away a touch as an audacious afterthought, Taylor beaten on the frontfoot
short ball, nice change up, catches Taylor off guard, as he is late on the pull
length and angled in, deflected down to fine-leg
length on middle, defended back to the bowler
length, angled in, tucked away to squareleg
full outside off, driven straight to mid-off
length, drifting in, uses the depth of the crease and tucks it away to squareleg
full on leg stump, swept away to deep squareleg. That could have been close had not connected
tossed up on middle, Taylor lunges forward and defends
tossed up on middle, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, inviting the big drive, but Taylor goes along the ground through covers
length on middle, Latham skips down the wicket and nudges it with soft hands between deep midwicket and deep squareleg, as they complete a comfortable couple
shapes to sweep even before the ball is bowled, but the ball is there for the lap shot, slow in pace on middle
premeditated sweep again, slow in pace and outside off from Kuldeep but again the pace of it allows him to go through with the shot even though he had to fetch it from way outside off
slow and full on middle, another lap sweep from Latham, played quite fine
full on middle, pushed down the ground
length outside off, quicker, punched straight to cover
tossed up and full on middle, defended back to the bowler
length outside off, bit of width, cut away to third-man
length, angling away, steered straight to point
short ball, Latham rocks back and tries to control the pull by coming down on it but is early into the stroke, gets an inside edge onto his body
length, down the legside
length on off and nearly scoops a return catch to Shami. Turned the face too soon as he looked to nudge to midwicket
snorter! Short ball hurries on to Latham and has him fending awkwardly
length on off, defended
tossed up on middle, pushed to long-off
tossed up on off, defended off the frontfoot
length outside off, turning away, Latham pushes it to deep cover
length on middle, it was the googly, Taylor watches it closely off the pitch and pushes it to point
full on leg stump and this time the sweep wasn't premeditated and he gets a bit more on it to finally earn a boundary. Would have been a massive appeal had he missed, however
full outside off, defended
length outside off, cut away to third-man as he had at the beginning of last over
short ball, not as well directed as the last one, doesn't rise as much either and tucked away to fine-leg with ease
length outside off, that upright seam helps Shami get a bit of movement even into the 25th over, Taylor is beaten all ends
full on middle, Taylor pushes it to mid-on and they scamper a single
slower ball, angled away, defended to point
length outside off, driven to the right of mid-off for a single
short outside off, rocks back and drags it to long-on using his wrists
length outside off, it was slightly quicker, induced a dangerous cut from Taylor but gets his bat down in time
googly outside off, watched closely and defended to point, Taylor took off immediately, bit of hesitation but they make it comfortably
short outside off, rocks back and pulls to deep midwicket
full on middle, closes the face and nudges it down to fine-leg
full on off, defended with soft hands
short ball, too high and he watches it over his head
length outside off, delicately steered to the right of thrid-man and fine enough to beat him comfortably
length on middle, defended to the right of the bowler
length on middle, kept a tad low, Taylor crouches and pushes it to midwicket
length outside off, out comes the favourite cut shot, wide of the diving point fielder and down to third-man for a couple
short, rocks back and hammers a pull in front of square to bring up the fifty-run stand in style
short again, misdirected down the leg side, Taylor helps it along to fine-leg.
length on middle, pushed to long-off
full on middle, pushed to long-on
length on middle, nudged through midwicket
length outside off, the trademark round-arm delivery, delicately cut down to deep point
tossed up, took forever to get to the batsman, 69kmph, defended with soft hands and they scamper a single
length on middle, pushed to midwicket
length outside off, steered down to third-man
slower ball, down the leg side, Latham watches it into the keeper's gloves
length, angling in, tucked away to fine-leg
length, angling in, tucked away to fine-leg
length and on the pads, flicked down to deep squareleg

massive appeal as Taylor plays all around that slower ball on off, umpire turns it down, and amid the chaos there's a direct hit at the striker's end. India review but it was umpires call as the ball was only just clipping the top of off
length on off, defended to cover
length on off, defended back
length and down the leg side
length outside off, Taylor rocks back for the cut but has no bounce to work with
tossed up on off, carefully defended off the front foot
length, drifting down, uses the depth of the crease to nudge it to deep squareleg
tossed up, pushed to midwicket, who fumbles, and there is a slight hesitation but they decide against the run
full on off, pushed through cover
length on middle, swept fine
length on middle, spins sharply back in, Taylor nudges it wide enough off the leg slip
full on off, defended back to the bowler
full outside off, Latham drags it to deep squareleg with a controlled sweep
full on off, pushed to long-off
full on middle, pushed to midwicket
slow in pace, full outside off, another fine, premeditated sweep
short outside off and finally Taylor gets the cut away between point and cover
length outside off, Taylor cuts again, this time played it much later than the previous shot and as a result it goes behind square, past point's right and that's Taylor's fifty
full on off, defended
length on off, defended to cover
round-arm, on the legs but no bounce to work with
length at middle stump, looks to drive through cover, gets it off the inside half
tossed up at off stump, gets to the pitch and flicks to deep midwicket
googly at a length on off stump, pushed to extra cover on the front foot

throw is wide and Taylor survives. Length at leg stump, tapped to midwicket's right. Taylor turns in slow-mo as Latham sends him back but the fielder is off balance and can't get this throw over the stumps
full toss on leg stump, flicked to deep square
full on off stump, driven to long-off
length at leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
well placed. And lovely patience on that too. Short of a length just outside off. Turning away. He gets deep in the crease and chops this late past slip
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, taps it to point's right. He's not quick getting across to it and sweeper has to clean up as they steal the second
length and skidding on. Punched to sweeper cover
length outside off, punched to long-off with the turn
full on off stump, driven to long-off
length on leg stump, poked to square leg off the front foot
length on off stump, gets back in the crease and defends into the turf
short of a length just outside off, sliced to short third
full on middle stump, under-edges a sweep to short fine
length at middle stump, sweeps to deep square
full on off stump, driven to long-off
swats it over deep backward square. Full loopy ball. Steps out, turns it into a full toss and helps himself
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length at off stump, steps out and drives to long-on
length outside off, drives to sweeper's right
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket off the back foot
length outside off, steps out and pokes to extra cover
length on middle stump, steps out and flicks to long-on
past point and four. Overpitched outside off. Stays leg side of it and chops on it late. Slips past Dhawan as he tries to get down to his left
googly. Beats him. Length at off stump, past the outside edge on the front foot
googly at a length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length at leg stump, steps out, meets on the full, and flicks to deep square's right to bring up his fifty
length on leg stump, flicks to short fine

flicked straight to deep midwicket. Latham might have had the wind against him, but in any case, that wasn't wide enough of Rayudu to make him work for it. It's lobbed up slow on leg stump. He steps out and clips uppishly but can't get his wrists around this aggressively enough. Lobs up, stops a little as it climbs, and lands in Rayudu's hands some ten yards inside
short of a length outside off, cut to sweeper cover
full on middle stump, flicked to long-on

length at middle stump, dropped into the covers with soft hands. Direct hit and Kohli thinks that's out as the umpire sends it. Raises the finger too, to assert that. Dead wrong. The third umpire takes one look. Nicholls has his bat grounded. Great work from Kohli, though. Swooped down on that and got the underarm flick out
another direct hit and there's no appeal this time. Short of a length just outside off, dropped to point's left with soft hands
length on middle stump, pushed to midwicket off the inside half
length and in at leg stump, poked to midwicket off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, dropped into the covers with soft hands
length and in at off stump, flicked to deep square off the back foot
thick edge and beats third man to the left! Short of a length just outside off. Short enough for him to whip at this. Not wide enough for the cut. But those are welcome runs
short of a length at off stump, pulled to short midwicket

superbly stopped by Dhawan but they'll get four anyway with the overthrows! Unless Pandya has got Taylor at the striker's end with a relay throw...no he hasn't. Safe. Length ball wide outside off. Slapped ferociously on the up to sweeper's left. Dhawan with big leap to get his hand behind that. Throws it on the bounce to the bowler whose direct hit ricochets past Karthik

a glove on that and Karthik's got it down leg. Might have been a slower ball, this bouncer. Nicholls inside the line and in position for the hook, but that seems to come towards his body off the pitch. Lobbed harmlessly to the keeper
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short ball across the corridor, left alone
length ball just outisde off, dropped into the point region with soft hands. That was a slower ball.
length on off stump, looks to push off the back foot. Inside edge onto boot
length and just outside off, pushed to cover's right off the back foot
length outside off, opens the face and pokes this to backward point's left
length at off stump, punched to mid-on off the back foot
length at off stump, tapped to mid-on with the angle
short of a length outside off, chopped to third man
slower ball at a length, down leg side. Looks to pull, beaten
floated up, full and wide outside off. Driven to sweeper's left

takes one to his left now, does Karthik. short and wide outside off. There for the cut. He plays it. But he's late on it. A fair deflection off a thin edge. DK skips swiftly to his left to get behind it
bouncer at a middle stump line, ducks under it
length and down leg side. Stands tall and tickles it to fine leg's right
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's right
length and just outside off. Hangs the bat inside the line and is beaten
length at off stump, defended to point

misjudged by Dhawan at sweeper cover, and Bracewell picks up four. Short and wide outside off. Jumps up to cover the bounce and unleashes an upper cut. Dhawan runs in and to his left and dives at an awkward angle with his left-arm outstretched. Might have had a chance to stop that if he had moved horizontally
length outside off, tapped to cover
short of a length at off, tapped to point
short of a length outside off, chopped to third man
length at off stump, blocked on the front foot

length on off stump, driven firmly to mid-off. Takes off the single immediately and seems to have made it. It's been sent upstairs. Direct hit from the fielder...and yes, Bracewell slides the bat in nicely
length and down leg side. Shuffles, lines up, nudges it fine. No one getting close to that
length at off stump, dropped into the point region with soft hands
short and just outside off. Pulled along the turf to deep square
length on leg stump, flicked to long-on
length and down leg side, beaten
full slower ball outside off. Sets up to slog this, but is forced to adjust because of the change in pace. Forced to drop this into the pitch

sliced and down to the fine leg boundary. The famous Taylor slog sweep against the pacer - it was attempted. Looked more like a Boult shot in the end. Slower ball gets him again. Length at off, and he is through it early
length on middle stump, flicked to midwicket
slower ball at a length outside off, sliced to third man
slower ball at a length on off stump, flicked to deep midwicket
slower ball at a length just outside off. Dabbed down to third man

nudges it straight to the keeper. But he's reviewed it. Bat was close to pad and possibly connected with the pad at the same time as he got this edge. Because there's no real reason to review this otherwise. It's at a length, just outside off. Thick edge straight to the keeper as he tried to guide it down to third man. New Zealand lose their review. Falls short of the hunded by seven runs, and now NZ have 29 balls with Bracewell and the tail.
short ball down leg side. Looks to pull. Awkward position. Gloves it towards fine leg
slower ball at a length outside off, slapped straight to extra cover on the bounce
full on off stump, tapped to mid-off on the up
slower ball at a length just outside off. Looks to dab this down to third man. Beaten on the outside ede
full and just outside off. Looks to drive to sweeper cover, gets it off the inside half to long-on
length at off stump, defended into the off side
slower ball, at a length and wide outside off. Looks to drill this through the covers. Beaten
slower ball at a length outside off, nudged to third man
yorker at leg stump, jammed to midwicket
bouncer outside off. Gets under it and tries to ramp to third man. Beaten
slower ball at a length on middle stump. Turns it into the leg side with soft hands
yorker at leg stump, jammed down to long-on
low full toss at off stump, tapped to mid-off
slower short ball wide outside off. Backs away and swings at it. Beaten

whack! Sweet sounding, average looking slog. My gosh did he connect on that. Short ball up at middle stump and he pumps if over the midwicket boundary with the back leg static, the front leg in the leg side, and the ego glittering

dropped! Yikes, Kohli makes a proper mess of this. Slower length ball at leg stump. Into it early as he looks to go into the off side. Chips up for Kohli who overruns from long-on and is falling backwards as he drops with a reverse-cup
yorker at leg stump, jammed back to the bowler

takes it this time. Length ball at middle stump. Ish gets some bat on this slog as well, but there's no elevation. Like a training hit out at Kohli, who takes a couple of steps in and takes this at waist height

oh dear. Poor judgement from Bracewell. Short of a length ball at off stump. Boult with the legs scattered as he tries to stab into the off side. Gets it into the leg side off the inside edge. To Kohli's left at short midwicket. Bracewell runs down blindly. Kohli has a walk and takes off the bails
slower all at a length outside off. Clears the front leg and swings at it. Thick outside edge to third man's left
full toss outside off, late punch into the turf. Bounces over the bowler
slower ball at a length outside off, gets the back foot across and clubs this to long-on. Off the toe-end
length outside off, slugged down to long-on

taken by short third just behind the keeper. Slower ball at a length outside off. Walks into the leg side and heaves from under it. Slices it high and DK gets out of the way for Shami to stride across to his left. Once again, New Zealand don't bat out their overs
full on middle, tentative push gets Rohit a single off an inside edge down to fine-leg
length on middle, defended back to the bowler from the crease
length, angled in, defended to mid-on
length on off, defended with angled bat to cover
full outside off, slight away movement, pushed through the covers
full on middle, inside edge onto the pod, stifled appeal
length on off, defended off the backfoot
full on off, draws Rohit forward, away movement, tentative footwork but the edge falls shorts off first slip
full on off, no swing this time and Dhawan caresses it through the covers
short outside off, just opens the face off the bat to find the gap between point and cover and it races to the fence
full on middle, bit of swing back into Dhawan, but he turns the face and times it superbly past mid-on's left, who was teased all the way down to the boundary but never had a chance
full on off, defended to cover
length on middle, squares him up but the edge goes down the third-man all along the ground
length outside off, extra bounce as Dhawan throws his hands at it and is beaten comprehensively
full on off, pushed to mid-off
length outside off, pushed to cover without much movement off the feet
length on off, pushed to point with an open face
full on middle, turns it away to midwicket
full on the pads and flicked gently past midwicket but races to the fence
length on middle, defended to mid-on
length, angled in, Rohit pushes it between midwicket and mid-on for a run
length, angled in, tucked away to midwicket
short outside off and that was asking to be hit just where it was, punched between point and cover
length, angled away, extra bounce, Rohit watches it carefully and decides to leave at the last instant
length on middle, hint of movement back but comfortably defended off the front foot to mid-on
length, angled in from round the wicket, gets a thick inside edge to squareleg
snorter!. That was quick, banged in on a length and reared disconcertingly on Dhawan, who gloved it with both feet off the ground, but just over the keeper's outstretched hands. Lucky
length outside off, attempted cut, but it keeps a little low and he is beaten on the inside edge
length on the stumps, keeps low again, he was shaping for the cut again but decided against it, adjusting late to the variable bounce
length outside off, bit of bounce, 140kmph, left alone
length on off, defended to cover
length on off, punched off the backfoot to mid-off
short ball, quick one, Rohit is late on the hook and beaten. Well directed
length on off, Rohit defends it to point
full outside off, driven to cover-point
length on off, defended to point
full on off, crunched off the frontfoot but straight to mid-off, who is pretty wide
full on middle, defended back off the front foot
short ball, well outside off, too wide to tempt Dhawan
slower ball on off, Dhawan picks it and defends it off the frontfoot
another slower ball, curved away ever so slightly and Dhawan chased it but found the gap through the covers and the timing took it to the fence
length on off, defended to point
length on off, defended to cover
short on off, opens the face and steers it to third-man
short outside off, cut away aerially to the right of point, down to third man
length outside off, flashes and gets a bottom edge down to third-man
full on the pads, tucked away beautifully but finds deep squareleg
length on off, defended to point
length outside off, bit of away movement, Dhawan feels for it without moving his feet and offers a simple catch to Ross Taylor at first slip
beauty first up! Length on middle, extra bounce and movement away, squaring Kohli up
poor follow up, on the pads, flicked but straight to squareleg
length outside off, left alone
length, angling away, left alone, wicket maiden
full on the pads and it releases the pressure built over the last few overs as the leg glance earns Rohit a four
length on off, punched to mid-off
overpitched on middle, pushed straight to mid-on
length outside off, pushed to cover
length outside off, steered to third-man
full on off, and Kohli showcases the prefect forward defence
length outside off, Rohit watches is into the keeper's gloves
length on off, turned using his wrists to the right of the bowler
short ball, early into the pull as it was a slower ball
short again, pulled behind square, all along the ground
length on the pads, tucked away to fine-leg
length on off, punched to cover-point
full outside off, driven to deep cover
full outside off, lunges forward and pushes it to mid-off
tossed up on middle, pushed to long-on
floated up outside off pushed through the covers
length outside off, slow in pace, pushed past point with an open face
full on off, opens the face to find the gap through covers again
length outside off, steered between point and cover-point
short outside off, Kohli crunches it off the backfoot through point
wide off the crease, angled in, Kohli opens the face to steer it to third-man but finds point
length outside off, another backfoot punch, this time straighter through covers
on the pads and flicked down the fine-leg
length outside off, cut away to third-man
tossed up on off, defended to point
tossed up outside off, drawing Rohit forward and the turn beats him
tossed up, Rohit knows what's coming, skips down the wicket and launches Santner straight down the ground
shorter this time, uses the depth of the crease and his wrists to tuck it away to the right of midwicket
length on middle, pushed to midwicket
full on off, driven to long-off
length outside off, steered to point
length, angled in, Kohli flicks it to the right of mid-on, who does well to put in a timely dive
length on off, defended to cover
length outside off, steered down to third-man
length, into the body, tucked away somewhat awkwardly to deep squareleg
short, Rohit is always happy to pull, almost compulsively, but gets an inside edge back onto the thigh pad
short outside off, cut past the right of point, cut off on the boundary
length on off, quicker, defended to point
full outside off, opens the face and gets it past the right of point
slower, shorter, outside off, Kohli opens the face to get it past short third-man but can't
quicker outside off, beaten on the front foot
length on middle, pushed past the bowler's right off the backfoot
short outside off, steered to point
length outside off, defended to point
length on off, quicker, pushed past the bowler's right, down to long-on
length outside off, pushed to cover
full on middle, pushed to long-off
quicker one on middle, pushed to long-on
length, angled in, nearly did Kohli for length as he played back but got his bat down in time
full on middle, defended back
length outside off, pushed to deep cover
full on off, pushed to cover
short outside off, punched to deep cover
short outside off, gets away with it as Kohli cuts straight to cover-point
beats the inside edge. Googly, at a length and wide outside off. Dips quickly as Rohit looks to drive with a huge gap between bat and body
length ball sliding outside off, gets down on one knee and paddles this fine of short fine
short of a length just outside off, punched to sweeper's right
full on leg stump, gets forward and pokes to long-on
overpitched outside off, driven with the turn to sweeper cover
full toss on middle stump, tapped to long-on
short of a length on middle stump, tapped to the bowler's right towards long-on
length at off stump, jabbed into the covers on the up
short of a length and angled in at off stump. Chopped to short third
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot

drags it to deep square's left. Not in full control there. Length ball at middle stump. Reaches out, doesn't quite get low for the sweep. In the end he's sort of shut his eyes and wafted in front of the body. It's off the inside half. But there's no deep midwicket and so he is safe attempting this
length on middle stump, punched to long-on with the angle
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
short ball, sliding at off stump. Kohli on the back foot quickly, gets the legs out of the way and lifts this pull over midwicket
short of a length on off stump, punched to sweeper off the back foot
low full toss outside off, swept out to deep square
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
googly at a length just outside off. Allows it to come on and opens the face late to get this fine of short third. Expertly done
length at off stump, tapped into the off side

oh good ball. Length and cutting in sharply to climb over middle stump. Kohli wants to drive through the line through the off side. Latham, ironically, with a mistake. Doesn't gather that cleanly as it dips to his left
short of a length outside off, punched to point off the back foot
short ball rising up at middle stump. Slow-ish pitch. Slower ball. Rohit has so much time to plant the front leg out and tonk this over midwicket
bouncer dug in too short, left alone
short of a length just outside off, stabbed to third man off the back foot
short of a length outside off, guides to third man with an open face
length outside off, driven with the turn to sweeper's left
length outside off, driven to sweeper with the turn
tossed up outside off, drilled firmly to sweeper's right off the front foot
full on leg stump, driven to long-on and it's another ODI fifty
length outside off, driven to sweeper's right
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper
length and slanted outside off, driven on the up, straight to extra cover
short of a length at leg stump. Looks to flick, cops it on the back thigh
exposes the stumps and guides this straight to point. Full and up at middle stump, slices it straight to the fielder
see ya. The majesty of the Rohit Sharma pull. Short at leg stump. Gets his weight on the front foot and springs up as it gets big on him. Slots it over square leg
bouncer slanted across the corridor, beaten on the upper cut
short outside off, lifts the cut to sweeper
short of a length outside off. Opens the face and gets it past the keeper
length on off stump, driven to sweeper off the front foot
length at middle stump, defended into the turf on the leg side
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length just outside off, hurried punch to mid-off
full on middle stump, flicked with the angle to long-on
short ball at leg stump, defended into the leg side
nothing wobbly about this ball, a mean bouncer up at the helmet. Kohli slashing hurriedly under it. Not completely in balance. Top edge clears fine comfortably though
short of a length into the body, misses as he looks to flick and cops that on the thigh guard
length at middle stump, whipped to midwicket off the back foot
short at leg stump, shovels it down to fine leg off the inside half and that is yet another 100 stand between a pair from India's top three
bouncer. Too short and down leg. Left alone
short at leg stump, hurries onto him as he goes for the pull. Drags it to deep square's left with a slice
short at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot. 49th ODI fifty for Kohli with that
length at leg stump, tapped to long-on off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, opens the face and runs it to short third
short of a length just outside off, beaten on the outside edge as he looks to run this down
length at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
length outside off, beaten on the drive away from his body
bouncer in the channel, backs into the leg side, lets it go
length on leg stump, flicked straight to midwicket
uppish but past Ferguson and into the boundary. Length outside off. No feet as he pokes at this. It's rising as he drives. But mid-off is wide and all he had to do was beat the bowler
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
bouncer. Too short. Doesn't even need to duck to let that go
overpitched outside off, driven firmly to mid-off
full and wide outside off. Reaches out to drive, beaten on the under-edge
length at middle, wants to drive to long-off. It slides on and gets the inside of the bat. It rolls back to the bowler
length on off stump, driven to extra cover
length at middle stump, slow through the air. Another drag across the line, out to deep square
length on off stump, pushed to short third off the thick edge

oh beautiful! Lovely loopy length ball outside off. 74kph, short of a length outside off. It's how you get the big slogger in the Under-13s. Rohit obviously a much better batsman than that, but this is an ungainly heave from him. Steps out early, doesn't get anywhere near it and swings all across it. It turns away, wide outside off. Latham completes the job
length at middle stump, bat pad on the front leg as this slides into his forward defence
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length just outside off, tapped to cover
short and wide outside off. Nicely on top of the bounce, leg side of it for the room and blazed past backward point with a cut
length on off stump, tapped past the non-striker on the up
short outside off. Shapes for the cut. It gets big on him. He's forced to rolls the wrists and get this to point
length outside off, opens the face and runs it to third man
short of a length just outside off, drops it in front of short third with an open face

shot! That's the audible verdict from Kohli too as Rayudu brings out a gorgeous inside-out shot over extra cover. this is length, pushed through quick. He gets half a stride out and stays tall as he gets this over that fielder with the full face offered
arm ball a a length, just outside off. Bat-pad on the forward defence. Outside the line
floated up full outside off, makes room as he gets on the front foot and carves this over cover. No one in the deep, safe shot
arm ball at a length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length and darted in at middle stump, defended off the back foot

nicely snapped by Nicholls! Another no-feet drive from Kohli at a length ball. Length ball pushed across him. Reaches out with his hands to try and get this over extra cover on the up. Nicholls times the jump perfectly as he holds on. That was coming down too as he took it behind his head, which suggests it could have been an offcutter from Boult. He was brought back for the wicket, and he gets it
top edge as he's late on the hook. Up at the rubs, hurriedly swishes under it. It drops tamely in front of fine leg
length on off stump, tapped between non-striker and stumps
short and in the corridor, defended off the back foot
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short at off stump. Short-arm pull to mid-on's right
length and in at off stump. Defended to midwicket off the inside half
length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length on middle stump, turned through square leg off the back foot
full and wide outside off, driven to long-off
length at off stump, punched to extra cover's left
into the extra cover boundary. Length outside off, slow and dipping. Looks to drive and is slightly beaten in flight. But he adjusts and goes through to lift this wide of mid-off
length at off stump, punched on the up to mid-off
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
bouncer at middle stump, gets the head out of the way, lets it go
length on off stump, driven on the rise to extra cover
short of a length outside off, guided down to third man
length on off stump, defended down the pitch
full outside off, pushed to cover
length, drifts in, turned to midwicket
length outside off, pushed to the left of cover for one
googly, but short and he rocks back and cuts
full on middle, pushed to long-on
full, down the legside, he tries to tap it on its head, misses but it beats the keeper regardless
full on off, pushed to cover
length, angled in, pushed to midwicket
slower ball, down the wicket comes Rayudu and goes through the line over cover and the timing carries the ball flat over the fence
length outside off, steered to third-man
full on middle, pushed back to the bowler
short ball, through the pull shot early, bottom edge back to the keeper
short ball again, times the pull better, but straight to deep squareleg
full on middle, defended off the front foot
googly, dragged down, he rocks back and pulls, but nearly holes out to deep midwicket, who eventually can't reach it even with the dive
overpitched outside off and the batsman obliges with a crunching cover drive
full on leg, pushed to midwicket
full on middle, driven back to the bowler
short ball, angled in, Rayudu ducks under it
length on off, defended to point
short ball, misdirected down the leg side and called wide
full outside off, a hint of curve away, draws Rayudu forward and beats his outside edge by a whisker
slower ball, turns the face early and gets a leading edge that falls safely on the off side
short ball, ducks under
length outside off, left alone by Rayudu
length on middle and he pulls almost off the front foot and in front of square. Imperious!
short again and pulled again, this time along the ground to deep squareleg
slower ball on middle, picked and defended off the front foot
length outside off, punched to deep cover
full on middle, slower ball, he was into the drive early and gets an inside edge down to fine-leg
short and another powerful pull shot in front of square. All along the ground from Rayudu
length on the pads, gets on his toes and tucks it away to midwicket
short outside off, steered to third-man, who is quite wide
short ball, hurries onto to Rayudu, who is struck on the gloves but does well to keep it down
another short ball, angled away, but he drops his hands and watches it into the keeper's gloves
short ball and despite the angle it is pulled imperiously in front of square. Didn't climb high enough, that one
full outside off, almost a yorker, he jams his bat down on it but misses
length outside off, steered to point
slower ball, floated up outside off, driven past the right of point
length outside, climbs as it leaves the batsman who has a poke and is beaten
full outside off, pushed past the right of point
slower ball, curved back in a little from middle, pushed to mid-on and they scamper a single
length outside off, defended to point
length outside off, left alone
length outside off, nearly chopped on, but past the stumps and stopped by the diving keeper
short ball and out comes the ramp from Rayudu, right over the keeper's head. Clever shot
short outside off, pushed to deep cover
length outside off, left alone
length outside off, steered to third-man
full toss, down the track and deposited on the grass banks over the deep midwicket fence
short, and he was ready for it, rocks back and punches it through the off side
full on off, pushed to long-off
short ball, goes down on one knee and hammers it to the deep squareleg fence. Had to say whether it was a sweep or a pull but effective, nevertheless
short and wide and called
length on off, defended to point
full on off, driven to cover who does well to stop it with a dive to his left
short ball, too high and over the keeper for five wides. An underwhelming finish to what has been an underwhelming series, thoroughly dominated by India, and sealed three-nil with two matches to go
